tags: my father will hear about this
summary:
Draco and Astoria walking towards Harry and Ginny.
Astoria: Why so tense Potter?
Ginny: Shut up Malfoy!
Astoria: Scared,...
body:
Draco and Astoria walking towards Harry and Ginny.


Astoria: Why so tense Potter?

Ginny: Shut up Malfoy!

Astoria: Scared, Potter?

Ginny: You wish.

Astoria: MY FATHER WILL HEAR ABOUT THIS.

Draco and Harry in the background: Oh god no.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

summary:
People always say that Harry is just like James, but I feel he’s very close to Sirius. 
Sirius grew up in an abusive household,...
body:
People always say that Harry is just like James, but I feel he’s very close to Sirius.

Sirius grew up in an abusive household, and (though for different reasons) did not know about some of the magical world. Sirius the Muggleborns and Harry all of it.

Harry could have been put into Slytherin, but didn’t want to be. That was the same with Sirius. Some people theorise that each of the marauders represent a different house and so do the golden trio and Neville, Harry and Sirius are Slytherin.

reblog.comment:
People always say that Harry is just like James, but I feel he’s very close to Sirius.

Sirius grew up in an abusive household, and (though for different reasons) did not know about some of the magical world. Sirius the Muggleborns and Harry all of it.

Harry could have been put into Slytherin, but didn’t want to be. That was the same with Sirius. Some people theorise that each of the marauders represent a different house and so do the golden trio and Neville, Harry and Sirius are Slytherin.

trail.content_raw:
People always say that Harry is just like James, but I feel he’s very close to Sirius.

Sirius grew up in an abusive household, and (though for different reasons) did not know about some of the magical world. Sirius the Muggleborns and Harry all of it.

Harry could have been put into Slytherin, but didn’t want to be. That was the same with Sirius. Some people theorise that each of the marauders represent a different house and so do the golden trio and Neville, Harry and Sirius are Slytherin.
trail.content:
People always say that Harry is just like James, but I feel he’s very close to Sirius.

Sirius grew up in an abusive household, and (though for different reasons) did not know about some of the magical world. Sirius the Muggleborns and Harry all of it.

Harry could have been put into Slytherin, but didn’t want to be. That was the same with Sirius. Some people theorise that each of the marauders represent a different house and so do the golden trio and Neville, Harry and Sirius are Slytherin.

tags: ron and hermione want their place in the wedding
summary:
Draco: Do you know what would be fun?
Harry: What?
Draco: If we don't invite your friends to our wedding but only mine
Harry: Do...
body:
Draco: Do you know what would be fun?
Harry: What?
Draco: If we don't invite your friends to our wedding but only mine
Harry: Do you know what would be fun? Spending the rest of our lives hiding for them, because they'll want to kill us
